channel.title: General Discussion
channel.description: Talk about Kinderparty Studios and its projects

item.title: Alive Again
item.author: invalid@example.com (Looter)
item.dc:creator: Looter
item.content:encoded: Hey, got my new PC and whatnot, so I'm available again .

item.title: Welcome to our new home!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Yoshiro)
item.dc:creator: Yoshiro
item.content:encoded: Just like the old home (except there was not an old home...)!

item.title: Who Is Kinderparty?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Yoshiro)
item.dc:creator: Yoshiro
item.content:encoded:
Good question!

But I really don't want to tell you the answer. Have a nice day.

item.title: Team Members - PM me your Account names here
item.author: invalid@example.com (Yoshiro)
item.dc:creator: Yoshiro
item.content:encoded:
I need the account names of your beyondunreal account so I can make sure you get into the private section.

Also hit me up on steam so I can know you to the Kinderparty Steam group. I'm using it for general announcements and such.
